example.parse: (S (VP (IV3FS+IV+IVSUFF_MOOD:S تكتب) (NP-SBJ (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_INDEF_NOM صحيفة) (ADJ+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_INDEF_NOM اجنبية)) (SBAR (SUB_CONJ ان) (S (NP-TPC-2 (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_ACC العرب)) (VP (IV3MP+IV+IVSUFF_SUBJ:MP_MOOD:I يعاقبون) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-2)) (SBAR-NOM-OBJ (WHNP-3 (REL_PRON من)) (S (VP (IV3MS+IV+IVSUFF_MOOD:I يؤمن) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-3)) (PP (PREP من) (NP (PRON_3MP هم))) (PP-CLR (PREP ب) (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN السلام))))))))))))))))) (PUNC ?))
